nodes.text: Telaat was a male Je'daii Temple Master serving the Je'daii Order on Tython at the height of the Infinite Empire's reign.

A Force-sensitive male, Telaat was trained in the ways of the Force by the Je'daii Order on the planet Tython, one of nine planets in the Tython system which made up the Settled Worlds. Appointed as a Je'daii Temple Master, the highest ranking members of the Order, Telaat governed the Great Temple of Balance, Akar Kesh throughout the Despot War. During the conflict, Telaat was struck down in 25,805 BBY and Ketu took up his position as steward of the Temple of Balance.
